bio: JPEG Collector | NFT Enthusiast | Full Time Degenerate | Using web3 | Digital Asset Investor | Not Financial Advice | Do your own research.
contributionDescription: I hope this message finds you well. I am Angga, and I am deeply interested in the advancements and solutions that Optimistic Ethereum brings to the Ethereum ecosystem. With my expertise and passion in community engagement, I am eager to contribute to the Optimism project.

contributionLinks.description: Badgeholders can view my contributions on my on-chain contract.

impactDescription: Through targeted marketing campaigns, collaborations, and the introduction of user-friendly tutorials, I played an instrumental role in increasing the user base of the Optimism platform in the last quarter. Feedback loops were also established to ensure continuous user engagement and feedback.
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, User Experience & Adoption, Content Creation
